text:
"Running" is a song sung by American-Hungarian singer Andras Kalláy Saunders. It was chosen to represent Hungary in the Eurovision Song Contest 2014 in Denmark.
Music video.
The music video was set in the outskirts of Budapest. The video shows a 7 year old girl who fears her abusive father. When her father comes back from work, he beats her in rage. She runs away from her home. At the same time Kalláy is singing the song, a mased woman is dancing around.
